name: blue-flare
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 20% chance to burn the target.
short_effect: Has a 20% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.black-white: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. It may leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. It may leave the target with a burn.
